MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G13 postcode area of Glasgow. affecting properties in Crow Road and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 10.03am. We are aware of the previous power cuts affecting your area and we apologise for this. Our engineers have arrived on site at Temple Gardens substation to investigate the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1.30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11.02am on Thursday 14th January 2021
